name: Potato & Broccoli Cheddar Soup with Herb & Cheddar Biscuits
description: Thank you, Stephanie Kell for this recipe!

ingredients.name: Easy Peasy Bagel, Pancake & Waffle Mix

preparation:
SOUP 

  1. Place your chopped potatoes, carrots, and broccoli in the Multipurpose Steamer with 2 cups of boiling water, Nourish Broth Mix, and Veggie Broth Mix. Cover with lid and steam in microwave for 10 mins.  
  2. Mix stew seasoning into 2 cups of milk, set aside. 
  3. Add in 3 Onion and CCB Dip Mixes and Minced Garlic. Cover and cook for additional 2 mins.  
  4. Using a potato masher, mash the potatoes, carrots, and broccoli until they are in very small pieces (should resemble lumpy mashed potatoes). 
  5. Pour in seasoned milk, mix well. Microwave for an additional 2 min intervals, stirring every 2 mins. Continue to microwave until it becomes thick.  
  6. Stir in shredded cheese; add pepper to taste. 
  7. Serve hot and enjoy!  

BISCUITS 

  1. Preheat oven to 375°. 
  2. Combine bagel mix and salt in a bowl. 
  3. Mix in Greek yogurt and dip mix, until a dough forms. 
  4. Work in shredded cheese. 
  5. Form into biscuit shape and place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner that has been brushed with oil. 
  6. Mix egg yolk with 1 tsp water, and brush on top of biscuits. 
  7. Bake for 18–20 mins
tips: This can also be made on the stovetop! Follow the same instructions; however, instead of microwaving, simply allow the mixture to simmer! I highly recommend steaming your veggies in your Multipurpose Steamer first to speed up the process!
